equilibrium.documentation: Description of a 2D, axi-symmetric, tokamak equilibrium; result of an equilibrium code. Time-dependent CPO

a_minor.documentation: Minor radius of the plasma boundary [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar
a_minor.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

a_minor.name: PPF/EFIT/CR0

download.documentation: Description of the method for calculating the signal. Fill the relevant elements below.
Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name. In case of a constant value, put 'fixed' here and fill the 'fixed-value' element below.

fixed_value.documentation: Fixed value of the signal in case 'download' = 'fixed'. NB : this value will be repeated in all time slices of the ITM signal, except if 'interpolation' = 0. Optional.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

interpolation.documentation: Interpolation method : 2 for previous sample, 3 for linear interpolation (as in the UAL), 0 if no interpolation required (also useful for a string or signal that does not depend on time in ITM format).

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

elongation.documentation: Elongation of the plasma boundary; Time-dependent; Scalar
elongation.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

elongation.name: PPF/EFIT/ELON

boundary.documentation: RZ description of the plasma boundary; This is formally declared as an array of structure to allow for time-dependent size of the R and Z vectors in the sub-structure below. However, boundary must be allocated to size 1. Time-dependent;

xpts.documentation: Position of the Xpoints, first is the active xpoint if diverted [m]; This is formally declared as an array of structure to allow for time-dependent size of the R and Z vectors in the sub-structure below. However, xpts must be allocated to size 1. Time-dependent;

r.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

r.name: %TDI%_xpfl=data(jet("PPF/EFIT/XPFL",%SHOT%)); _rxl=jet("PPF/EFIT/RXPL",%SHOT%); _sig = BUILD_SIGNAL((_xpfl GT 90)*_rxl + (_xpfl LT 90)*(-666),*,dim_of(_rxl,0))

download.documentation: Description of the method for calculating the signal. Fill the relevant elements below.
Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name. In case of a constant value, put 'fixed' here and fill the 'fixed-value' element below.

fixed_value.documentation: Fixed value of the signal in case 'download' = 'fixed'. NB : this value will be repeated in all time slices of the ITM signal, except if 'interpolation' = 0. Optional.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

interpolation.documentation: Interpolation method : 2 for previous sample, 3 for linear interpolation (as in the UAL), 0 if no interpolation required (also useful for a string or signal that does not depend on time in ITM format).

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

position.documentation: Position of the magnetic axis [m]; Time-dependent; Scalar;

r.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

r.name: PPF/EFIT/RMAG

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

toroid_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field, redundant with the toroidfield CPO, to be used by the ETS

r0.documentation: Characteristic major radius of the device (used in publications, usually middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane) [m]. Scalar.

psi_norm.documentation: Poloidal flux [Wb], without 1/2pi and such that Bp=|grad psi| /R/2/pi. Time-dependent; Vector (npsi)
psi_norm.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

psi_norm.name: %TDI%_f=jet("PPF/EFIT/F",%SHOT%); _nrad=size(_f,0); _nt=size(_f,1); _sig = SPREAD(dim_of(_f,0),1,_nt),*,dim_of(_f,0),dim_of(_f,1)

fixed_value.documentation: Fixed value of the signal in case 'download' = 'fixed'. NB : this value will be repeated in all time slices of the ITM signal, except if 'interpolation' = 0. Optional.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

interpolation.documentation: Interpolation method : 2 for previous sample, 3 for linear interpolation (as in the UAL), 0 if no interpolation required (also useful for a string or signal that does not depend on time in ITM format).

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

profiles_2d.documentation: Output profiles in the poloidal plane. Time-dependent

psi.documentation: values of the poloidal flux at the grid in the poloidal plane [Wb]; Time-dependent; Matrix (ndim1, ndim2)
psi.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

download.documentation: Description of the method for calculating the signal. Fill the relevant elements below.
Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name. In case of a constant value, put 'fixed' here and fill the 'fixed-value' element below.

fixed_value.documentation: Fixed value of the signal in case 'download' = 'fixed'. NB : this value will be repeated in all time slices of the ITM signal, except if 'interpolation' = 0. Optional.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

interpolation.documentation: Interpolation method : 2 for previous sample, 3 for linear interpolation (as in the UAL), 0 if no interpolation required (also useful for a string or signal that does not depend on time in ITM format).

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

concat_dim.documentation: Dimension of the ITM signal on which to do the concatenation (1 or 2) of the local signals

dim1.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

dim1.name: PPF/EFIT/PSIR

download.documentation: Description of the method for calculating the signal. Fill the relevant elements below.
Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name. In case of a constant value, put 'fixed' here and fill the 'fixed-value' element below.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

dim2.reminder: Enter in the structure below how to retrieve this variable from the experimental database. Replicate this element if more than one signal needs to be read in the local database

name.documentation: Name of the signal in the local database

dim2.name: PPF/EFIT/PSIZ

download.documentation: Description of the method for calculating the signal. Fill the relevant elements below.
Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name. In case of a constant value, put 'fixed' here and fill the 'fixed-value' element below.

fixed_value.documentation: Fixed value of the signal in case 'download' = 'fixed'. NB : this value will be repeated in all time slices of the ITM signal, except if 'interpolation' = 0. Optional.

fixed_repeat.documentation: Repeat factor for the fixed value given above; this tag contains the same number of values than fixed_value. Optional.

coefa.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

coefb.documentation: After download, the signal can be transformed as coefa * signal + coefb. Optional.

interpolation.documentation: Interpolation method : 2 for previous sample, 3 for linear interpolation (as in the UAL), 0 if no interpolation required (also useful for a string or signal that does not depend on time in ITM format).

dimension.documentation: Dimension of the local DB signal : 1 for vector, 2 for matrix, ... s for string, 0 if non-time dependent in the local DB (may need to be repeated at each time slice in ITM format, though)

size.documentation: Size of the local DB signal (number of columns in the data matrix) mandatory only for 2D signals

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).

time_base.documentation: Declaration of the multiple time bases in the experimental database, used for calculating the common (CPO) one

sampling_rate.documentation: String 'min' or 'max' : Use the highest sampling rate (min) or the lowest sampling rate (max) of all experimental time bases to define the common time base

time.documentation: List of the experimental time bases used for this CPO (replicate this element if more than one must be used)

name.documentation: Name of the time base in the experimental database

time.name: PPF/EFIT/BVAC

download.documentation: Name of the download method, as listed in the top element mapping_info/download_method/name

time_dim.documentation: Specifies which of the above dimension represents time (in the local DB).
